attributes.action: keep member of parliaments wage rise to the same rate as most public sector workers wage rises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mps do not deserve to get inflation busting wage rises following the furore over the police pay rise how can mps demand  10 per cent whilst expecting everyone else to stick to below inflation pay rises .If they get their way it will be nothing short of a disgrace to the rest of the hard working uk population
